short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple in-browser photo editor - use this when you want to do some quick edits to your photos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this free online tool to quickly and easily perform common photo editing tasks directly in your browser... 

Features:
- edit images from your computer
- edit images from a URL you enter
- select an image in a browser tab, then choose "Edit Photo" from the right-click context menu
- adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, change orientation, image scaling, apply presets and filters, crop and scale, add watermarks and signature.
- provides links to other tools from LinangData from the More tools menu, including: XML Formatter; CSV - JSON Converter; Grammar, spelling and style checker; Calculator; Photo Exif Data Viewer; Weather Forecast; World Clock
- It's free!
